Question: During the 1990s, this person also published the novels Surrender the Pink (1991) and Delusions of Grandma (1993).
Hints: This person dated musician Paul Simon from 1977 until 1983 and was then married to him from August 1983 to July 1984.
In 1973, this person enrolled at London's Central School of Speech and Drama, which she attended for 18 months.
Vanity Fair's George Wayne wanted this person to explain if their relationship was sexual.
